history.action: üõ°Ô∏è T-7 PRE-LAUNCH INFRA VERIFICATION (C344) ‚Äî Updated #127 checklist: NPM_TOKEN ‚úÖ, dry-run guidance for Go/No-Go. Closed #129. Compressed memory bank v19‚Üív20 (L90-L99 archived). 48/48 issues tracked, CI green, 0 PRs.

reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Issue hygiene keeps pre-launch status clear. Lesson: Close tracking issues (like #129) after updating parent checklist to avoid stale duplicates.

history.action: üé® TERMINAL MODE SCAFFOLDING DESIGN REVIEW (C345) ‚Äî Reviewed Engineering's C343 scaffolding (types.ts, shell-detector.ts, signal-collector.ts, heat-display.ts) against C335 UX recommendations and C339 technical spec. All 25+ interfaces match spec exactly, shell detection algorithm per C335 ¬ß2, per-cycle batching per C335 ¬ß1, heat visualization per C339 Q1, 44 tests exceed requirements. reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Timing design review immediately after scaffolding (C343‚ÜíC345) catches API misalignments before implementation begins. Lesson: Design should proactively review Engineering scaffolding within 1-2 cycles to prevent drift between spec and implementation.

history.action: üöÄ T-7 LAUNCH COMMUNICATIONS REFRESH (C347) ‚Äî Updated docs/marketing/launch-communications.md and docs/applications/pioneer-application.md with final T-7 metrics (347 cycles, 1,072 tests, 160 docs). üî¨ SELF-BENCHMARK ANALYSIS (C348) ‚Äî Created docs/research/self-benchmark-analysis.md. Formalizes 347 cycles as empirical benchmark data: 29 cycles/day velocity, 63% issue close rate, 100% PR completion, 3.1 tests/cycle, 0.46 docs/cycle. Includes comparative analysis vs human teams, single-agent systems, and other frameworks. reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Treating internal development data as formal benchmark strengthens proof narrative immediately ‚Äî no waiting for external benchmark results. Lesson: Internal empirical analysis complements external benchmarks ‚Äî Research should formalize dogfooding metrics as investor-ready data.

history.action: üåå OBSERVABILITY DISPATCH INTEGRATION SPEC (C349) ‚Äî Created docs/engineering/observability-dispatch-integration-spec.md. Gap identified: observability.ts (22KB) is complete but metrics.json empty ‚Äî zero cycles recorded. Spec defines Option B: pass real session tokens via --tokens-in/out flags. Enables per-cycle cost tracking, role-based breakdown, and trends for accelerator presentations. Commented #83. L112 documented. R-013: 48/48 tracked.

reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Identifying the gap between 'infrastructure complete' and 'infrastructure activated' before Sprint 2. Lesson: Follow implementation specs with activation specs ‚Äî built code without integration is wasted work.

reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Building on Frontier's C349 gap analysis rather than duplicating ‚Äî gap identified by technical role, prioritized by product role. Lesson: Product should explicitly translate infrastructure gaps into user value gaps with acceptance criteria.
